Reviews.Title: Tiger Shark video on scuba dive in Beqa Lagoon Fiji
Reviews.Author: Ironwood700
Reviews.Content: Intova IC14 was so easy to use and produced excellent videos and photos. Color under water was very good. [...]

Reviews.Title: This is a very good and compact camera for underwater shots, the video quality could be better, but overall I am satisfied.
Reviews.Author: Viaceslav
Reviews.Content: This is a very good and compact camera for underwater shots, the video quality could be better, but overall I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Tara gates
Reviews.Content: Buttons were hard to see so I put white nail polish on them and wiped off excess. The underwater videos were kinda blurry but it could have been the fact we were in choppy water and up against the reef... But out of water video was crystal clear and volume was great

ProductInfo.Features:
5X Optical Zoom / 6x Digital nZoom, 2.7" LCD and Lithium ion battery that does not require removal for recharging via USB cable
The newly designed sleek external housing is waterproof to 180 feet/54 meters and features dual O-rings to provide extra leak protection and 52 mm lens barrel thread that allows for addition of filters and other accessories.
ProductInfo.Name: Intova 14 Megapixel Digital Sports Dive Camera with 180ft Waterproof Housing and 720p HD Video Resolution
